Chunglae Cho

Publications

Publications in Journals

  1. Algorithms and Stability Analysis for Content Distribution over Multiple Multicast Trees. Xiaoying Zheng, Chunglae Cho and Ye Xia. Accepted at the IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems. 2014.
  2. Content Distribution by Multiple Multicast Trees and Intersession Cooperation: Optimal Algorithms and Approximations. Xiaoying Zheng, Chunglae Cho and Ye Xia. Submitted to a journal and under review. 2013.
  3. Optimal Swarming for Massive Content Distribution. Xiaoying Zheng, Chunglae Cho and Ye Xia. IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems. 2010.
  4. Algorithms and Performance of Load Balancing with Multiple Hash Functions in Massive Content Distribution. Ye Xia, Shigang Chen, Chunglae Cho and Vivekanand Korgaonkar. Computer Networks. 2009.

Conference Presentations

  2. Multi-Tree Multicast with a Backpressure Algorithm. Chunglae Cho and Ye Xia. IEEE Conference on Decision and Control. 2010.
  3. Algorithms and Stability Analysis for Content Distribution over Multiple Multicast Trees. Xiaoying Zheng, Chunglae Cho and Ye Xia. IEEE Conference on Decision and Control. 2009.
  4. Content Distribution by Multiple Multicast Trees and Intersession Cooperation: Optimal Algorithms and Approximations. Xiaoying Zheng, Chunglae Cho and Ye Xia. IEEE Conference on Decision and Control. 2009.
  5. Optimal Peer-to-Peer Technique for Massive Content Distribution. Xiaoying Zheng, Chunglae Cho and Ye Xia. IEEE INFOCOM. 2008.
